name: DesktopVRIK
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.
changelog:
- No longer requires AvatarMotionTweaker.
- No longer piggybacks on IKSystem.
- DesktopVRIK will now handle VRIK Locomotion weight instead of relying on the game to handle it. This means LeapMotionExtension will now work properly while crouched/prone.
